C

CannotDecodeException - Exception in Steganography.Exceptions
The CannotDecodeException exception is thrown when an error occurs when decoding an image, mainly when trying to decode images that don't contain hidden data.
CannotDecodeException(String) - Constructor for exception Steganography.Exceptions.CannotDecodeException
Constructs a new CannotDecodeException with the specified error message.
CannotDecodeException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception Steganography.Exceptions.CannotDecodeException
Constructs a new CannotDecodeException with the specified error message and cause.
CannotEncodeException - Exception in Steganography.Exceptions
The CannotEncodeException exception is thrown when an error occurs when encoding an image, mainly empty data or larger data than capacity.
CannotEncodeException(String) - Constructor for exception Steganography.Exceptions.CannotEncodeException
Constructs a new CannotDecodeException with the specified error message.
CannotEncodeException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception Steganography.Exceptions.CannotEncodeException
Constructs a new CannotDecodeException with the specified error message and cause.
capacity - Variable in class Steganography.Logic.BaseSteganography
Capacity of the cover image.
CIPHER_ALGORITHM - Static variable in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Algorithm used to cipher the data.
CIPHER_BLOCK_SIZE - Static variable in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Size of the cipher block (128 bit AES = 16 bytes).
CIPHER_SPEC - Static variable in class Steganography.Logic.AESEncryption
Parameters of the algorithm used to cipher the data.
close() - Method in class Steganography.Logic.GifSequenceWriter
Close this GifSequenceWriter object.
compress(byte[]) - Static method in class Steganography.Logic.ZLibCompression
Compresses a given byte array into another file using Deflator from the ZLib java library.
compress(File, File) - Static method in class Steganography.Logic.ZLibCompression
Compresses a given file into another file using Deflator from the ZLib java library.
compressDocument - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
compressMessage - Variable in class Steganography.Controller

copy() - Method in class Steganography.Controller
Copies the content of the Controller.secretMessage TextArea to the system clipboard.
copy(InputStream, OutputStream) - Static method in class Steganography.Logic.ZLibCompression
Copies an InputStream to an OutputStream in chucks using a buffer
copyMenu - Variable in class Steganography.Controller

coverImagePane - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
 
coverImageView - Variable in class Steganography.Controller
